repeatable.title: Repeatable
repeatable.description: Whether the page/component should be repeatable

repeatableMinimum.title: Minimum number
repeatableMinimum.description: Minimum number of times to repeat items

repeatableMaximum.title: Maximum number

repeatableDelete.title: Delete string
